mapper.select: SELECT c.total,m.maxFTime,p.dataQueryGroupName,p.planTaskName,p.dataQueryTaskName,p.outputFormat,p.beginTime,p.result FROM `plan_task_record` p, ( SELECT COUNT(*) total ,planTaskName FROM `plan_task_record` WHERE dataQueryGroupId = #{dataQueryGroupId} AND planTaskName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{planTaskName}, '%') GROUP BY planTaskName )AS c, ( SELECT MAX(finishTime) maxFTime,planTaskName FROM `plan_task_record` GROUP BY planTaskName ) AS m WHERE c.planTaskName = m.planTaskName AND p.`finishTime` = m.maxFTime
